introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this section is はいたつ, which you will often hear in contexts related to mail and packages in everyday life. Imagine ordering online and excitedly waiting for your はいたつ to arrive! This word is essential for understanding how items move from point A to point B. Let's explore it together!
meaning_explanation_english: The word "配達" means "delivery" in English. It refers to the act of conveying goods or items from one location to another, typically handled by a person or company that specializes in transporting goods such as packages or mail.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonyms: 配送 : はいそう : delivery
synonym_explanation: The most common synonyms of the word "配達" are "配送" and "送付." The term "配送" often emphasizes the broader logistics and shipping process, whereas "送付" specifically refers to sending documents or letters. While all three involve the transportation of items, "配達" is more commonly associated with direct delivery to an address.
antonyms: 受取り : うけとり : receiving
収集 : しゅうしゅう : collecting
antonym_explanation: The most common antonyms of the word "配達" are "受取" and "収集." "受取" refers to the act of receiving something, as opposed to delivering it, while "収集" involves the gathering or collecting of items. Together, these antonyms highlight the opposite end of the delivery process.

example_sentences.furigana: 配達(はいたつ)の人(ひと)が来(き)ました。

translations.ES: La persona de reparto ha llegado.
translations.FR: La personne de livraison est arrivée.
translations.AR: الشخص الذي يوصل البضائع قد وصل.

example_sentences.kanji: 配達料金はいくらですか？
example_sentences.furigana: 配達(はいたつ)料金(りょうきん)はいくらですか？

translations.EN: How much is the delivery fee?
translations.VI: Phí giao hàng là bao nhiêu?
translations.FR: Quel est le frais de livraison ?
translations.MY: ပို့ဆောင်ခ ဘယ်လောက်ပါလဲ?

example_sentences.kanji: 配達時間は何時ですか？
example_sentences.furigana: 配達(はい)(たつ)時間(じ)(かん)は何時(なん)(じ)ですか？

translations.VI: Thời gian giao hàng vào lúc nào?
translations.FR: À quelle heure est la livraison ?
translations.MY: ပို့ဆောင်ချိန် ဘယ်အချိန်လဲ ၍ စုံစမ်းပါ။

example_sentences.kanji: 配達物を待っています。
example_sentences.furigana: 配達(はいたつ)物(ぶつ)を待(ま)っています。

translations.EN: I am waiting for the delivery.
translations.MY: ငါကနေထားတင်ပို့မှုရှိနေပြီ။
translations.HI: मैं डिलीवरी का इंतज़ार कर रहा हूँ।

example_sentences.kanji: でんわで配達をたのみます。
example_sentences.furigana: でんわで配達(はいたつ)をたのみます。

translations.EN: I will order delivery by phone.
translations.ID: Saya akan memesan pengiriman melalui telepon.
translations.VI: Tôi sẽ đặt giao hàng qua điện thoại.
translations.FR: Je commanderai la livraison par téléphone.
translations.BN: আমি ফোনের মাধ্যমে ডেলিভারি অর্ডার করব।
translations.ZH: 我会通过电话订购送货。
translations.HI: मैं फोन से डिलीवरी का ऑर्डर करूँगा।
translations.FA: من تحویل را با تلفن سفارش می‌دهم.
